title: Fake profiles, Fraud and Phishing
learning_objectives: Learn to identify fake profiles, online fraud, and fishing
Understand the intentions of these malicious practices
Learn to report fake profiles, fraud or phishing
main_messages: Be careful and critical when being online
Report and block such profiles or actions
questions: What is a fake profile, and how malicious users can use it?
What experiences do they have with these incidents?
